titleStmt.title: Orders to be observed on the day of the royal coronation of King William and Queen Mary the eleventh of this instant April.
titleStmt.author: Norfolk, Henry Howard, Duke of, 1655-1701.

notesStmt.note: Signed: Norfolke and Marshall (i.e. Henry Howard, Duke of Norfolk and marshal of ceremonial protocol).
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
